sentence.text: Horstick et al. (2013) previously reported a homozygous p.Trp284Ser variant in skeletal muscle contraction as the cause of Native American myopathy (NAM) in 5 Lumbee Native American families with congenital hypotonia and weakness, cleft palate, short stature, ptosis, kyphoscoliosis, talipes deformities, and susceptibility to malignant hyperthermia (MH).
